block.p: Alisha Lauren Berger, the daughter of Julie and Richard Berger of Trumbull, Conn., is to be married this afternoon to Christoph Lyle Gorder, the son of Gordeen Gorder and the Rev. John Gorder of Chicago. Rabbi Larry Milder will officiate at the Oceanside Meadows Inn in Prospect Harbor, Me.

The bride, 27, is the assistant to Bob Herbert, Op-Ed columnist at The New York Times. She graduated from the University of Pennsylvania and received a degree in French language, civilization and culture from the Sorbonne. Her father is the vice president of Sonic and Thermal Technologies, a manufacturer of plastics assembly equipment in Milford, Conn. Her mother is a founder of Trumbull Loves Children, an after-school program.

His father is the pastor of the Augustana Lutheran Church of Hyde Park in Chicago.
